means: 向上翘的，上下翻转过来的

sentence.Network_en: Down below them was the sea of upturned faces.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们下面是无数张仰望的脸。

sentence.Network_en: He clung to the upturned boat, screaming for help.
sentence.Network_cn: 他紧紧抓着住倾覆的小船，高呼救命。

sentence.Network_en: He felt a sharp prick when he stepped on an upturned nail.
sentence.Network_cn: 当他踩在一个尖朝上的钉子上时,他感到剧烈的疼痛.

entry.tran: 朝上的；朝上翘的；向上翻的
entry.def: Something that is upturned points upwards.

example.ex: ...the rain splashing down on her upturned face.
example.tran: 溅落到她仰起的脸上的雨水

example.ex: ...his eyes closed and his palms upturned.

entry.def: Something that is upturned is upside down.

example.ex: He clung to the upturned boat, screaming for help.
example.tran: 他紧紧抓着住倾覆的小船，高呼救命。

means.word_mean: 1. having been turned so that the bottom is no longer the bottom;
2. (used of noses) turned up at the end;
